landing.description: Passionate Front End Web Developer eager to expand skills and embrace new challenges.

about.title: About me
about.name: I'm
about.parraf: With over 3 years of experience in Customer Service and Success across Ireland, Spain, and The Netherlands. My journey has taken me through diverse roles and countries, shaping me into a well-rounded professional with a passion for technology.  My time in these roles has equipped me with a strong foundation in customer-centric problem-solving and effective communication. I've had the privilege of working with people from different backgrounds and cultures, which has broadened my perspective and sharpened my interpersonal skills. This experience played a pivotal role in my decision to enroll in an intensive web development course, where I've honed my skills in software development. I realized that technology is a powerful tool to address customer needs and provide innovative solutions. My transition to web development allowed me to bridge my love for technology with my commitment to customer satisfaction.
about.parraf2: Today, I am highly motivated to continue my journey in the technology industry, combining my diverse background, customer-centric approach, and newfound web development expertise.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently.
projects.cashFlowDescription: This is a personal project, where I wanted to put Vue.js into practice. The biggest challenge was using traditional HTML as templates that Vue uses, it was like learning another way of approaching a problem.
projects.memoryGameDescription: This is a personal project, I have created an educational game to practice JavaScript by applying sounds. The challenge I had was to reset the cards that I solved with a for function.
projects.harryPotterDescription: This project is an evaluation project from Adalab, where I applied my knowledge of React and API integration. The main challenge I encountered was grasping the concept of 'lifting state up' and mastering the communication flow between parent and child components. I overcame this challenge through dedicated research, hands-on practice, and seeking feedback from teachers and documents.
projects.awsomeCardsDescription: This is a real bootcamp team project where I applied JavaScript and CSS/SASS in practice while working under an Agile and Scrum system. The biggest challenge I encountered was resolving conflicts during commits to the master branch. However, this challenge was overcome through fluid team communication.
projects.guessNumberDescription: This project was one of the initial bootcamp assessments involving JavaScript and CSS. The most significant challenge was completing it within a single morning, with just one week of learning JavaScript. Thanks to Stack Overflow and a solid understanding of the fundamental concepts needed for its application, my game worked!
